name: Pendant #1
description:
Awesome and fun this glass fused pendant is handmade by Jordana Gerlach. 

Approximately 1  wide x 1 - 1/2" length with silver plated bail. 

Standard 18" box silver plated necklace included. 


What is fused glass? 

The basic idea behind fused glass is that two or more pieces of glass are placed in the kiln and heated until they fuse together into a single artistic creation.  

No two pieces are exactly the same although if you are interested in similar colors please contact me directly for more options.

name: Plate #1
description:
Bright color makes this piece special.  It is a stack plate handmade by Jordana Gerlach

What is a fused glass Stack plate?

The basic idea behind fused glass is  two or more pieces of glass are placed in the kiln and heated until they fuse together into a single artistic creation.  A stack plate is formed by placing little pyramids of glass on a large piece of glass.  Then it is set in a mold and fired in the kiln to make a three dimensional object.  This plate is approximately 8 1/4" X 8 1/4".

No two pieces are exactly the same although if you are interested in similar colors please contact me directly for more options.

name: Bowl #2
description:
Hand made by Jordana Gerlach.

This exciting piece is 8" square and stands about 2" high.  It is truly an eye catching work of fused glass art.

There is also a matching circular bowl 10 1/2" in diameter for $100.
